info.name: House
info.description: House Coat of Arms of Yozolin's Lost Tome.
info.author: Lucky Crown

description.p: House Lesdow is one of the oldest houses in Kelleteas, with a history that stretches back to the founding of the city. The house has always been known for its strong ties to the land and its commitment to preserving the natural beauty of the region. The Lesdows have been instrumental in the development of sustainable farming practices and have played a key role in the city's agricultural success.
